alert.note: Alert for Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 12:03PM PST until December 08 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 2500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory above 2500 feet, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. For the second Winter Weather Advisory above 3000 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Southern Trinity County. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 4 PM Friday to 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
